config.environment_ini:
[general]
refresh_date = 2025-06-12
user = 
environment = 
mo_name = 
driver_dataset = 
dataproc_project_name = 
dataproc_storage_bucket = 
local_output_base_path = 
gcs_base_path = gs://my-bucket/data/processed
queue_name = default
namespace = gds-packman
config.solution_ini:
[general]
model_name = 
check_point = 
email_to = 
state_file = 
cosmos_project = 
gcp_app_id = 

[load_raw_data]
data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/customer_data.csv
processed_data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/customer_data_processed.parquet

[feature_selection]
feature_list = ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
selected_features_data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/customer_data_processed.parquet

[train_test_split]
test_size = 0.2
random_state = 42
train_data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/train_data.parquet
test_data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/test_data.parquet

[normalize_data]
feature_list = ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
normalized_train_data_path = ${general:gcs_base_path}/normalized_train_data.parquet
scaler_path = /home/user/models/scaler.pkl

[train_model]
feature_list = ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
model_params = {"n_estimators": 100, "random_state": 42}
model_path = /home/user/models/random_forest.pkl

[model_evaluation]
feature_list = ["age", "income", "credit_score", "price_per_unit"]
evaluation_results_path = /home/user/models/eval_results.txt
